about_the_game:
Need a little sinister edge in your fantasy game? This pack has got it all with tilesets, characters and music for you to create a wonderful dark fantasy world. With beautiful interior and exterior tiles for creating amazing gothic castles or mansions and characters to populate and fill out your expanding fantasy world! Also includes a windowskin and 5 music tracks to round out your dark fantasy world!

Features:

・Tileset: 15 files
・8 characters come with:
・・Waking sprite & TVD
・・Face image
・・Pictures (Bust-up image)
・・SV animated battlers
・Audio: 5 tracks
・Windowskin x 1
detailed_description:
Please read before you buy!

Please note that "RPG Maker MZ - Dark Fantasy Resource Pack" and "RPG Maker MV - Dark Fantasy Resource Pack" are the same pack, only the title "MV" and "MZ" are different. The content in these packs are exactly the same, so if you already have one of these packs, you don't have to purchase the other!


About the Game

Need a little sinister edge in your fantasy game? This pack has got it all with tilesets, characters and music for you to create a wonderful dark fantasy world. With beautiful interior and exterior tiles for creating amazing gothic castles or mansions and characters to populate and fill out your expanding fantasy world! Also includes a windowskin and 5 music tracks to round out your dark fantasy world!

Features:

・8 characters come with:
・・Waking sprite & TVD
・・Face image
・・Pictures (Bust-up image)
・・SV animated battlers
・Audio: 5 tracks
・Windowskin x 1
